programs.name: Asp
programs.icon: Gold cobra spitting green laser beams

programs.name: Giant
programs.icon: A large foot dropping on runner
programs.effect: 3d6 brain damage. Runner is jacked out suffering effects of all rezzed ICE including Giant.

programs.name: Hellhound
programs.icon: Flaiming, black metallic wolf with white eyes
programs.effect: 2d6 brain damage. Uninsulated deck's will catch fire.

programs.name: Kraken
programs.effect: 3d6 brain damage. Runner can't make further progress or jack out for a turn.

programs.name: Liche
programs.effect: Lower INT, REF, DEX by 1d6 each for 1 hour.

programs.name: Raven
programs.effect: Derez 1 defender program that is rezzed. Then 1d6 brain damage

programs.name: Skunk
programs.effect: Slide checks -2 while Skunk is rezzed. Can stack

programs.name: Wisp
programs.icon: Orb with a single crackling eye
programs.effect: 1d6 brain damage and reduce NET Actions by 1 for 1 turn (min of 2)

programs.name: Dragon
programs.effect: 6d6 rez damage. If derezzes, program destroyed

programs.name: Killer
programs.icon: Red eyed, robot samurai with katana
programs.effect: 4d6 rez damage. If derezzes, program destroyed

programs.name: Sabertooth
programs.icon: A large cat with glowing tusks
programs.effect: 6d6 rez damage. If derezzes, program destroyed
